boundary_validation.verdict_detail: DISCREPANCY: Zoning Exception 42 (RD) DOES apply to this parcel, but the property FAILS the textual boundary check: west of Royal York Rd. Passed: south of Bloor St W, east of Mimico Creek. This means TOCA's textual boundary description may be imprecise -- the actual exception zone extends beyond the stated boundaries.
